message: Let's start fair, Bob. Take 10%, I'll take 90%. We can always adjust later if you think it's unfair.
I'll take 30% and leave 70% for you. It's a good starting point, and we can adjust from here.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I still think 70% is too low for me.  Let's try 80/20 this time.  I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need a fairer share.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll take 40% and leave 60% for you. It's a fair compromise, considering the inflation and our previous offers.
